title: The Strongest Dan God - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Xuanhuan
tags: Alchemy   Arranged Marriage   Beasts   Beautiful Female Lead   Broken Engagement   Brother Complex   Clever Protagonist   Cultivation   Cunning Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Inscriptions   Magic Formations   Male Protagonist   Martial Spirits   Pill Based Cultivation   Pill Concocting   Previous Life Talent   Romantic Subplot   Schemes And Conspiracies   Slow Romance   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Transmigration   Weak to Strong
author: Pure Feathers   郁真羽
description: Ye Zifeng was the continent’s strongest and most revered alchemist. He was below one and above millions. However, due to an unpredictable series of events, he died. After his rebirth, he had become the supertr*sh of the Ye family and had to suffer from disgrace. To make matters worse, he had an argument with his fiancé that had led to the breaking off of their engagement. In this second life, he will work hard to change his destiny and vows to return to the peak of the world, trampling on those who had mocked him and rewrite his legacy!>
